headline: Shoot like a Pro
bodyCopy: When speed and performance are packed into a pocket sized camera, you become a photographer wherever you go.

items.title: Optimal optics
items.bodyCopy: With all the adaptable mount and options to pick  the lenses of your needs, you can bundle with the 16-50mm power zoom lens and add Sony's new ultra-slim lens to your collection.

testimonial.copy: “Best pocket camera we have seen for 2013”
